channel.title: Help runing old windows games
channel.description:
hey guys i was diging around in my cupboard an i found some old windows games that i hadnt played in ages.
how ever when ever i try to run them i always get this error:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img82.imageshack.us/img82/2796/erroryo1.gif[/img][/URL]
i have search the net an havnt found any solutions :(
if anyone knows away to get the games working probly i will be very happy an gladly rep++ you
thanks for taking ya time to read this
o an btw the games i am trying to run are sim theme hostpital sim theme park an red alert i am also runing windows xp

item.title: Help runing old windows games
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Try useing DOSbot, its an emulator

Read full topic
